answers.answer: UNHCR is providing cash assistance for four months to meet expenses of eligible Ukrainians and third-country nationals displaced due to the ongoing conflict.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'What is UNHCR’s financial cash assistance programme in Romania?'.

answers.answer: Refugees who meet the eligibility criteria can fill out a form, and after review, an appointment can be made for an interview for cash assistance.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'Scheduling an appointment to register for Cash assistance by UNHCR'.

answers.answer: Eligibility requires being displaced from Ukraine, registered with temporary protection for at least 30 days, having lived in Romania for at least 30 days before UNHCR registration, not previously interviewed for Cash for Protection, not receiving other multi-purpose cash assistance/vouchers of RON 600 or more, and meeting at least one of the specified family vulnerability categories.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'Who is eligible for UNHCR cash assistance?'.

answers.answer: UNHCR is providing one-time cash assistance of 720 lei per person to cover expenses related to the winter period.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'How much money is provided as cash assistance?'.

answers.answer: UNHCR’s Cash Enrolment Points are open 5 days a week (Monday-Friday) from 9:00 am – 5:00 pm and are closed on weekends.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'Where are UNHCR’s Cash Enrolment Points? When are they open?'.

answers.answer: All family members must be present and bring identification documents, proof of entry date into Romania, and an active Romanian or Ukrainian mobile phone number.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'What should I bring to my enrolment appointment?'.

answers.answer: You need to physically visit the nearest UNHCR enrolment center to update your records and phone number.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'I have changed my phone number. Can I update it remotely by e-mail or phone?'.

answers.answer: Enrolling your fingerprints helps protect your unique access to financial cash assistance and guards against fraud.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'Why do I need to provide my fingerprints to receive cash assistance from UNHCR?'.

answers.answer: You can receive the payment through MoneyGram, Smith&Smith, or a Romanian bank account, requiring specific documents like Proof of Enrolment, passport/identity, and a pick-up code or bank account details.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'Do I need a Proof of Enrolment document for picking up assistance from MoneyGram, a bank or Smith &Smith?'.

answers.answer: You will receive a text message to your mobile phone within a maximum of 15 days indicating the date, time, and location of your appointment.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'Scheduling an appointment to register for Cash assistance by UNHCR'.

answers.answer: In case of a change in your family composition, all family members need to be physically present in one of the nearest UNHCR enrolment centers to update your details and all supporting documentation.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'What should I do if I want to change my family composition (birth of babies, marriages and divorces, death of family members) or family focal point?'.

answers.answer: From the time you receive the SMS with your MoneyGram pickup code, you have a total of 20 days to go to any MoneyGram branch and retrieve the cash.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'How much time do I have for picking up the cash assistance when sent through MoneyGram?'.

answers.answer: You can contact UNHCR at +4021 201 7873 or CNRR at 0040 730 073 170 / office@cnrr.ro for support.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/financial-support-from-unhcr and read the section under 'Contacts'.
